title: Violin Basics: Holding the Bow
description: Learn the proper way to hold your violin bow for optimal control and sound production.

title: First Position Scales
description: Master your first major scales in first position with proper finger placement.

title: Vibrato Technique
description: Develop a beautiful vibrato with these step-by-step exercises.

title: Shifting to Third Position
description: Learn how to smoothly shift between first and third positions.

title: Double Stops Masterclass
description: Advanced techniques for playing perfect double stops in tune.
